# Boots, Winged
## Overview
**Aura** moderate transmutation; **CL** 8th

**Slot** feet

**Price** 16,000 gp

**Weight** 1 lb.

**Description**

These boots appear to be ordinary footgear. On command, they sprout wings at the heel and let the wearer fly, without having to maintain concentration, as if affected by a *[[Fly (Spell)|fly]]* spell (including a +4 bonus on [[Fly (Skill)|Fly]] skill checks). He can fly three per times day for up to 5 minutes per flight.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Fly (Spell)|fly]]*

**Cost** 8,000 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 504
